titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Organizational and Employment History, Accession 2018:041
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Organizational and Employment History, Accession 2018:041 FA743
titlestmt.author: Katie Martin

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 17:29:19 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Organizational and Employment History, Accession 2018:041

physdesc.extent: 12 boxes (11 document containers and 1 half document container)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains Ford Foundation organization charts, staff directories, biographies of staff (including employment and educational histories), and staff photographs.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to RAC in 2018 and 2021 by the Ford Foundation and ingested by RAC as Accessions 2018:041 and 2021:022.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into four series:

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Ford Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Ford Foundation.
